_meta.description: Qwen3-TTS Voice Design - Create custom voices from natural language descriptions
_meta.use_case: Generate speech with AI-designed voice from text description (no reference audio needed)

agent_notes.VOICE_DESCRIPTION: Natural language description of desired voice. Examples: 'A deep, warm male voice with a slight British accent, speaking slowly and professionally', 'Young energetic female voice, cheerful and animated', 'Elderly wise narrator with gravelly undertones'
agent_notes.unique_feature: No reference audio needed - describe the voice you want in plain English

2._comment: Generate speech with AI-designed voice from description
